item.title: Formatting Python Code
item.description: Styling Guide (PEP8) You can read it here. To start following it, install locally pycodestyle package and run it through your code. $ pip install pycodestyle $ pycodestyle --ignore=E501 run.py run.py:15:1: E302 expected 2 blank lines, found 1

item.title: Parsing Arguments
item.description: # main parser = argparse.ArgumentParser() parser.add_argument("action", choices=['list', 'add', 'search', 'import'], help="list local repositories, add new one or search by tags") parser.add_argument("--url", nargs='?', help="url of repository to add") parser.add_argument("--note", nargs='?', help="personal note about repository") parser.add_argument("--tags", nargs='?', help="tags for repository") parser.add_argument("--clone", nargs='?', choices=['yes', 'no'], default="no", help="clone repository locally") parser.add_argument("--user", nargs='?', help="user to download stars from") args = parser.parse_args() setup_yaml() if args.action == "list": read_all() elif args.action == "add": if args.url is None or args.

item.title: Shrinking Go Binaries
item.description: # -s and -w flags $ GOOS=linux go build cmd/go $ ls -l go -rwxr-xr-x 1 filippo staff 12493536 Apr 16 16:58 go $ GOOS=linux go build -ldflags="-s -w" cmd/go $ ls -l go -rwxr-xr-x 1 filippo staff 8941952 Apr 16 17:08 go # upx $ GOOS=linux go build cmd/go $ ls -l go -rwxr-xr-x 1 filippo staff 12493536 Apr 16 16:58 go $ upx --brute go Ultimate Packer for eXecutables Copyright (C) 1996 - 2013 UPX 3.

item.title: Create Github Pages Helm Repository
item.description: $ git clone git@github.com:d47zm3/helm-charts.git $ cd helm-charts $ mkdir src $ helm create src/test-chart $ helm package src/* $ helm repo index --url https://d47zm3.me/helm-charts/ . $ git add -A . && git commit -m "creating chart repository" && git push origin master $ # set up github pages from master branch $ helm repo add d47zm3 https://d47zm3.me/helm-charts/ $ # make changes $ helm repo index --url https://d47zm3.me/helm-charts/ --merge index.yaml . $ helm search repo test-chart

item.title: About
item.description: Name: Damian Age: 29 Job: DevOps Engineer Interests: Psychology DIY Cooking IT (Security, System Administration, Reverse Engineering, Networks) Accomplishments: Offensive Security Certified Professional Certified Kubernetes Administrator Google Cloud Associate Engineer
